main event: On June 1, 1957, a disc-shaped object with a yellow-white light was observed hovering vertically above the trees in Carmichael, California.
interesting points: The object was reported to be 2 inches in diameter,The object had a steady glow and disappeared vertically without blinking lights,The source of the report was a truck driver with no prior interest in UFOs,One individual described seeing the object as a bright stationary star before it commenced maneuvers,The report suggests that the sighting could be explained by meteorological or aircraft conditions.
sighted object: one disc-shaped object with a yellow-white light
witness description: a 32-year-old truck driver and signalman in the U.S. Navy
